overview:
Vincent Camara is Sr. Director and Head of Sales at Socialbakers where he leads the go-to-market strategy for France.

Prior to Socialbakers Vincent led the Business Development team at Techlightenment, a social technology company later acquired by Experian.

Vincent has over 12 years international sales and marketing, business development and account management experience. He has taken senior responsibility in a multitude of roles, across all areas of business and at various phases of business growth. His passion for innovation in technology, music and film led him to start Intruders tv, a European Web Video network covering innovation.

relationships.title: Sr. Director - Head of Sales, France
